translation.en: Oh, fuck.
I wasn't trying to escape.
No, please. Don't. Don't.
I don't want to die.
translation.fr: Faites pas ça. Je veux pas mourir.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, I'll make you clean.
I'm sorry.
I didn't-- I didn't mean to....
Hey, sis.
-Time is it? -Just after 8.
translation.fr: Il est quelle heure ? Un peu plus de 8 h.

translation.en: -You want me to make coffee? -No, I gotta go. I'll call you later.
translation.fr: Je te fais un café ? Non, je dois y aller. Je t'appellerai.

translation.en: You sure there's nothing I can do?
Angie, everything's gonna be fine. Just go back to sleep.
All right, I'm coming, I'm coming.
Ben Carson.
Lorenzo Sapelli. I've been waiting for you. Come on in.
translation.fr: Lorenzo Sapelli. Je vous attendais. Entrez.

translation.en: Thanks.
-How long you been working here? -All together...
translation.fr: Vous travaillez ici depuis quand ? En tout... ça fait 15 ans.

translation.en: ...15 years.
You were here for the fire?
Devastating.
Entire building up in flames.
It's been five years since the fire.
translation.fr: Ça fait cinq ans que ça a brûlé.

translation.en: They're still in a legal battle with the insurance companies.
translation.fr: Ils sont encore en procès avec l'assurance.

translation.en: Even cleaning up this mess is impossible.
translation.fr:
Même nettoyer ce bordel,
c'est impossible.

translation.en: I've given up faith about reopening, and besides...
translation.fr: J'y crois plus, à la réouverture. Et puis...

translation.en: ...who'd ever want to shop here after everything that's happened?
translation.fr:
Qui viendra faire ses courses ici,
après tout ça ?

translation.en: You know, the Meredith family acquired this building...
translation.fr: La famille Meredith a acheté le bâtiment

translation.en: ...after St. Matthew's Hospital closed in 1952.
translation.fr:
après la fermeture
de l'hôpital St Matthew, en 52.

translation.en: It was the very first Mayflower to open on the East Coast.
translation.fr:
C'était le premier Mayflower
à ouvrir sur la Côte Est.

translation.en: The company wants us to patrol the premises every couple of hours.
translation.fr:
La direction veut qu'on fasse
une ronde toutes les deux heures.

translation.en: But I do my rounds every three, that's more than enough.
translation.fr:
J'en fais une toutes les trois heures,
ça suffit.

translation.en: Anyway, you'll see, not too much going on. It's pretty calm around here.
translation.fr:
De toute façon, vous verrez... Il se passe
pas grand-chose. C'est calme, par ici.

translation.en: Well, there you go.
Perfume and Cosmetics Department, what's left of it anyway.
translation.fr:
le rayon Parfums et Cosmétiques.
Ce qu'il en reste.

translation.en: Thank God you didn't show up any later. This place gives me the creeps at night.
translation.fr:
Heureusement que vous êtes venu tôt.
C'est sinistre, la nuit.

translation.en: No electricity.
All these mirrors.
Best to keep your eyes away from them. You polish them?
translation.fr:
- Vaut mieux pas les regarder.
- Vous les astiquez ?

translation.en: -I'm sorry? -The mirrors, they're so clean.
translation.fr:
- Pardon ?
- Les miroirs. Ils ont si propres.

translation.en: No, that's Gary. Gary Lewis.
Fella who was working here before you.
translation.fr: Le type qui était là avant vous.

translation.en: He was completely obsessed with these damn mirrors.
translation.fr: Il était obsédé par ces foutus miroirs.

translation.en: Spent the entire night cleaning them.
translation.fr: Il passait ses nuits à les nettoyer.

translation.en: How long has it been since you left the N.Y.P.D.?
translation.fr: Depuis quand vous avez quitté la police ?

translation.en: About a year.
I know it's none of my business, but... ...why did you resign from the force?
translation.fr:
Ça me regarde pas, mais...
Pourquoi vous avez démissionné ?

translation.en: You used to be a detective, is that correct?
Yeah.
I'm sorry.
I always been too curious.
It's all right.
There was a pretty big team working here before the fire.
translation.fr:
Y avait du monde qui travaillait ici,
avant l'incendie.

translation.en: You know, when you stop to think... ...of all the department stores in New York...
translation.fr:
Quand on y pense...
De tous les grands magasins de New York,

translation.en: ...this one was the most beautiful, the most luxurious.
translation.fr: c'était le plus beau, le plus luxueux.

translation.en: I mean, it breaks your heart, it really does.
translation.fr: Ça fait mal au cœur, vraiment.

translation.en: Well, here you go.
This is where you'll be spending most of your time.
translation.fr:
C'est là que vous passerez
le plus de temps.

translation.en: At least you got electricity in here.
translation.fr: Au moins, il y a l'électricité.

translation.en: It's warm, it's nice.
You've even got a TV.
I opened up the trunk, where he so-called hid the pictures.
translation.fr:
J'ai ouvert le coffre
où il avait caché les photos.

translation.en: I grabbed the goody bag, walked to the backyard...
translation.fr:
J'ai pris le sac,
je suis allée dans l'arrière-cour,

translation.en: ...opened up the barbecue grill, I grabbed the lighter fluid....
translation.fr: j'ai pris le barbecue, l'essence, et j'ai mis le feu.

translation.en: Hello?
-Hello. -Hey, Rosa. How are you doing?
translation.fr:
Coucou. - Ça va, Rosa ?
- Ça va. Je vais vous aider.

translation.en: I'm fine. Let me help you.
translation.fr:
- Ça va, Rosa ?
- Ça va. Je vais vous aider.

translation.en: Thanks.
-Where are the kids? -Upstairs with Señor Ben.
translation.fr: Où sont les enfants ? En haut... avec M. Ben.

translation.en: Thanks.
So, everybody at my school thinks this boy named Eamon...
translation.fr: A l'école, tout le monde croit qu'Eamon,

translation.en: ...which is like one of my best friends, which is a boy, likes me.
translation.fr:
un de mes meilleurs copains garçons,
est amoureux de moi.

translation.en: And this girl named Christiana, who liked him, is just now gossiping.
translation.fr:
Et Christiana, qui était amoureuse de lui,
elle dit des trucs.

translation.en: You want me to talk to Mrs. Ward?
She'll make them want to wrap me up in toilet paper for Halloween.
translation.fr:
Non, sinon ils vont m'envelopper
de papier toilette, pour Halloween.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
Look, Mommy. Look what Daddy got me.
translation.fr: Regarde ce que papa m'a acheté.

translation.en: It looks great. You'll have to show me how it works later.
translation.fr: Super. Tu me feras une démonstration.

translation.en: It's so fast, Mommy.
Ben? Can I talk to you?
Yeah.
You two. You need to finish homework. You need to get ready for your bath.
translation.fr:
Allez, vous deux... Toi, tu finis tes devoirs.
Toi, tu vas prendre ton bain.

translation.en: -No fooling around, let's go. -Okay, let's go, Michael.
translation.fr: Allez. Ne traînez pas. Viens, Michael.

translation.en: Hey. Come here.
Happy, happy birthday.
-Thanks, Dad. -Yeah.
Hey.
-What is this? -What?
I've asked you not to drop by without calling.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit d'appeler avant de passer.

translation.en: You won't answer my calls.
-I don't want to argue. -I don't want to argue.
translation.fr: J'ai pas envie de discuter. Moi non plus.

translation.en: If you're not gonna answer my calls, what--?
I haven't had a drink for three months.
translation.fr: Je ne bois plus depuis trois mois.

translation.en: Since you won't answer, how would you know?
translation.fr: Mais tu peux pas le savoir.

translation.en: I don't want to know.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas le savoir.

translation.en: What I want is for you to respect my needs.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu respectes mes choix.

translation.en: I'm doing everything I can to respect your needs.
translation.fr: Je fais ce que je peux pour ça.

translation.en: I haven't had a drink.
I got a new job to hold me over till I'm reinstated.
translation.fr:
J'ai trouvé un boulot,
avant d'être réintégré.

translation.en: I'm doing everything I can to get back on my feet again.
translation.fr: Je fais tout pour me remettre d'aplomb.

translation.en: What?
You don't think people can change?
We're not talking about people. We're talking about you.
translation.fr: On ne parle pas des gens. On parle de toi.

translation.en: Amy, I killed a man.
You don't just get over that.
translation.fr: Ça ne s'efface pas comme ça.

translation.en: I needed time. I needed you.
translation.fr: J'avais besoin de temps. Et de toi.

translation.en: -I was right here. -Yeah. Judging me like everybody else.
translation.fr:
- J'étais là.
- Oui... à me juger, comme les autres.

translation.en: How dare you say that to me.
I was the only one at the precinct who defended you.
translation.fr: J'étais la seule à te défendre.

translation.en: How many times did I chase reporters off our front lawn?
translation.fr: Je chassais les journalistes du jardin.

translation.en: How can you say that to me?
I've always been in your corner. I've been the only one who believed in you.
translation.fr: J'étais de ton côté. J'étais la seule à te croire.

translation.en: You're fucking unbelievable!
Please, I didn't come here to fight.
translation.fr: Je suis pas venu pour me battre.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry that I came over without calling.
I just wanted to see them.
-But we have to set up some rules. -What fucking rules?
translation.fr: Il faut des règles. Mais quelles règles, putain ?

translation.en: Come on, Amy, just tell me what rules I need to follow...
translation.fr: Dis-moi, Amy. Quelles règles je dois suivre

translation.en: ...so I can see my son on his birthday!
translation.fr:
pour voir mon fils
le jour de son anniversaire ?

translation.en: Look at yourself.
This is exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.fr: C'est exactement de ça que je parle.

translation.en: I don't know how you're going to be from one moment to the next.
translation.fr: Tu changes d'un instant à l'autre.

translation.en: When I get around you, I get... ...nervous.
translation.fr:
Quand je suis près de toi,
je deviens... nerveux.

translation.en: Because I am so scared that I am losing you.
translation.fr: Parce que j'ai peur de te perdre.

translation.en: And I screw everything up.
I've missed you so much. I miss you too.
translation.fr:
- Tu me manques tellement.
- Tu me manques aussi.

translation.en: Amy, we deserve another chance.
I know how much I love you, and I know somewhere inside there... ...you love me too.
translation.fr:
Je sais que je t'aime et qu'au fond,
tu m'aimes aussi.

translation.en: Please.
Please.
I can't do this.
I can't do this, Ben.
Holy shit.
What the hell?
Fuck!
What the...?
You should stop taking those pills. Jesus!
translation.fr:
- Arrête de prendre ces cachets.
- Bon sang !

translation.en: How are you doing today?
I'm fine. I feel a lot better. I'm leaving in a couple of minutes.
translation.fr: Beaucoup mieux. Je vais pas tarder.

translation.en: -Are you sure you're all right? -Please, not you.
translation.fr: Tu es sûr que ça va ? Je t'en prie, pas toi.

translation.en: Okay. I'm just saying, you can talk to me if you want.
translation.fr: Je veux dire que tu peux me parler.

translation.en: I'm your little sister.
-It's that new job, isn't it? -Yeah, well, I need that new job.
translation.fr: C'est ce nouveau boulot ? J'en ai besoin, de ce boulot.

translation.en: I can't take care of Amy, and the kids, and myself on my pension.
translation.fr:
Pour Amy, les enfants et moi,
ma pension ne suffit pas.

translation.en: I'm not gonna sleep on your couch for the rest of my life.
translation.fr:
Je coucherai pas éternellement
sur ton canapé.

translation.en: Okay, well, maybe you get a daytime job, a regular job.
translation.fr:
Trouve un travail de jour.
Un travail normal.

translation.en: It's not that simple.
Well, you should think about it.
Ben! What happened?
Just leave me alone. Please, just leave me alone!
Angie, get out of here! Now!
What is happening to you, Ben?
Pull yourself together.
Help!
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
No!
Gary Lewis.
Esseker.
Hello?
Hello?
Where are you?
I want to help you, but I need to know where you are!
translation.fr: Je vais vous aider, si je sais où vous êtes !

translation.en: Damn it!
I'm coming!
Anybody here?
Is anybody in here?
Fuck this place.
Mom! Mom! Mom!
Mom! Mom!
Michael? Are you okay? What's happening?
translation.fr:
- Maman !
- Michael ? Ça va ? Qu'y a-t-il ?

translation.en: Michael. What's the matter, sweetie?
-There's a lady screaming. -Where?
translation.fr:
- Y a une dame qui hurle.
- Où ça ?

translation.en: There, in the mirror. In the mirror?
translation.fr:
- Là, dans le miroir.
- Dans le miroir ?

translation.en: I don't see anybody but you and I in the mirror.
translation.fr: Je ne vois que toi et moi.

translation.en: -You just had a nightmare, sweetie. -Okay.
translation.fr:
- Tu as fait un cauchemar.
- D'accord.

translation.en: Sometimes they can feel really real, but they're not, all right?
translation.fr: Ça a l'air vrai, mais ça ne l'est pas.

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay, let's go back to sleep.
Come on. In you go.
I'm right around the corner, all right?
Love you. I love you too, sweetie.
translation.fr:
- Je t'aime.
- Je t'aime, mon cœur.

translation.en: Can you leave the door open? Sure, sweetheart.
translation.fr:
- Tu laisses la porte ouverte ?
- Oui, mon cœur.

translation.en: You two go back to sleep, okay? All right, Mom.
--not clear how it happened.
The 42-year old is expected to go on trial this month for allegedly...
translation.fr: L'homme de 42 ans va être jugé ce mois-ci

translation.en: ...sexually assaulting a former co-worker in her apartment...
translation.fr:
pour avoir agressé sexuellement
une ancienne collègue chez elle

translation.en: ...for 13 hours on Halloween night in 2005.
Braunstein's lawyer says his client was mentally ill at the time.
translation.fr:
L'avocat de Braunstein dit que son client
n'avait pas toutes ses facultés.

translation.en: The feds say they'll seek the death penalty against a former mob boss...
translation.fr:
Les Fédéraux veulent la peine de mort
contre un ancien chef de la mafia

translation.en: ...accused of ordering a hit on a rival.
translation.fr:
accusé d'avoir donné l'ordre
de tuer un rival.

translation.en: The trial of Vincent "Vinny Gorgeous"....
I swear to you, I could feel my flesh burning.
translation.fr: Je te jure, je sentais ma chair brûler.

translation.en: I couldn't breathe. It was like my lungs were full of smoke.
translation.fr: J'étouffais, les poumons pleins de fumée.

translation.en: It was like a nightmare but I was awake. I know I was awake.
translation.fr: C'était comme un cauchemar. Mais éveillé.

translation.en: You think I'm crazy, don't you?
translation.fr:
- Tu crois que je suis fou.
- Je sais pas quoi penser.

translation.en: I don't know what to think. I think you're going through...
translation.fr:
- Tu crois que je suis fou.
- Je sais pas quoi penser. Tu traverses une mauvaise passe.

translation.en: ...a hard time in your life. You're under a lot of stress.
You've been having those nightmares since the shooting.
translation.fr: Tu fais des cauchemars depuis la fusillade.

translation.en: You know it wasn't your fault. They're everywhere.
translation.fr:
- C'était pas ta faute.
- Ils sont partout.

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -The fucking mirrors, they are everywhere.
translation.fr:
- De quoi tu parles ?
- Ces putains de miroirs sont partout.

translation.en: In the department store, on the corner of every street...
translation.fr: Au grand magasin, aux coins des rues, sur tous les immeubles.

translation.en: ...in the window of every building in this city. I f--
translation.fr: sur tous les immeubles. J'ai l'impression que...

translation.en: I feel like I'm not the one looking into the mirrors...
translation.fr: ce n'est pas moi qui regarde les miroirs

translation.en: ...but they're looking back at me.
There's no one looking back at you through the mirrors.
translation.fr: Personne ne t'observe dans les miroirs.

translation.en: You're obviously.... You're still conflicted about what happened.
translation.fr:
Tu es encore
sous le coup de ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: Maybe you need to talk to someone.
A professional. Someone....
Mirrors are just glass and silver, Ben, that's it.
translation.fr: Un miroir, c'est du verre et de l'argent.

translation.en: There's nothing behind them.
Will you please go get some sleep, okay?
I love you.
Coming!
Hold on!
-Mr. Carson? -Yeah.
You want to sign here, please?
You have a good day, sir. Thanks.
Holy shit.
Lorenzo, I need to talk to you.
translation.fr: Lorenzo, il faut que je te parle.

translation.en: I just had the craziest day here. Your ex-colleagues came to pay us a visit.
translation.fr:
J'ai eu une journée dingue.
Tes anciens collègues sont venus.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
You know Gary, the guy who was working here before you?
translation.fr: Gary, le type qui travaillait ici avant toi...

translation.en: Yeah.
Cops found him dead in a subway station in Harlem.
translation.fr:
Les flics l'ont trouvé mort dans le métro,
à Harlem.

translation.en: I never liked him too much, but poor guy, he didn't deserve to go like that.
translation.fr:
Je l'aimais pas trop,
mais il méritait pas ça.

translation.en: -Did they tell you the cause of death? -What?
translation.fr:
Ils t'ont dit la cause du décès ? - Quoi ?
- Comment il est mort ?

translation.en: -Did they tell you how he died? -No, they wouldn't tell me.
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Comment il est mort ? Ils m'ont pas dit.

translation.en: Mrs. Sapelli is waiting for me at home. I gotta go.
translation.fr: Mme Sapelli m'attend. Faut que j'y aille.

translation.en: By the way, about that leak in the basement...
translation.fr: Au fait, pour la fuite au sous-sol...

translation.en: ...they're sending someone over to work on that, beginning of next week.
translation.fr:
Ils vont envoyer quelqu'un
en début de semaine.

translation.en: We have a white male, 50 years of age, name unknown.
translation.fr:
Un homme, blanc, 50 ans.
Identité inconnue.

translation.en: Following the completion of the external examination...
...the body was washed and lightly dried.
translation.fr: le corps a été lavé et légèrement séché,

translation.en: A Y-incision was made from the bilateral clavicular joints...
translation.fr:
une incision pratiquée
de l'articulation acromio-claviculaire

translation.en: ...to the xiphoid process.
-The tissue was waterlogged-- -Amy.
translation.fr:
- Les tissus étaient imbibés d'eau...
- Amy.

translation.en: Yes, what is it?
There's someone in the lobby for you. It sounds urgent.
translation.fr:
On te demande dans le hall.
Ça a l'air urgent.

translation.en: Ben. What's happening? What are you doing here?
Thanks for seeing me. Look, I need to ask you a favor.
translation.fr:
Merci d'être venue.
J'ai un service à te demander.

translation.en: -I'm in the middle of work. -I know.
Twenty minutes. Yesterday morning you picked up a body.
translation.fr:
- Je travaille.
- Vingt minutes. Hier, vous avez reçu un corps...

translation.en: Gary Lewis. I just need to take a look at him.
translation.fr: Gary Lewis. Il faut que je le voie.

translation.en: -Who is he? -A night watchman at the Mayflower.
translation.fr:
- Qui est-ce ?
- Il était gardien au Mayflower. Je l'ai remplacé.

translation.en: I replaced him.
How do you have his driver's license?
translation.fr:
Comment tu as eu son permis ? J'ai trouvé son portefeuille.
Je veux savoir comment il est mort.

translation.en: I found his wallet in the department store. I just need to know how he died.
translation.fr:
J'ai trouvé son portefeuille.
Je veux savoir comment il est mort.

translation.en: Why do you need to know how he died?
You've been suspended, you're not supposed to be doing any investigations.
translation.fr:
Tu as été suspendu.
Tu n'es plus enquêteur.

translation.en: Listen to me, this is serious.
There are some very strange things happening over at the Mayflower.
translation.fr:
Il se passe des choses étranges
au Mayflower.

translation.en: I can't explain what it's--
This guy Gary Lewis sent me a package right before he died.
translation.fr:
Ce Lewis m'a envoyé un paquet
avant sa mort.

translation.en: Thing is, I never met him before.
Inside the package were all these articles on the Mayflower, on the fire.
translation.fr:
Le paquet contenait
des articles sur l'incendie.

translation.en: Like he was trying to tell me something, or warn me about something.
translation.fr:
Comme pour me dire quelque chose
ou me mettre en garde.

translation.en: I need to figure this out. Please.
Gary Lewis, Gary Lewis. There he is, B-16.
translation.fr: Gary Lewis... Il est là. B-16.

translation.en: He slashed his throat.
Well, there you go, there's your answer. Your man committed suicide.
translation.fr: Tu as ta réponse : il s'est suicidé.

translation.en: You get a lot of suicide cases with people that slash their own throats?
translation.fr:
Vous avez beaucoup de suicidés
qui s'égorgent ?

translation.en: I didn't think so. Excuse me.
All I know is, the police are still investigating this one.
translation.fr:
Ce que je sais,
c'est que l'enquête continue.

translation.en: -That's why we still have the body. -What did he use to cut his throat?
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'il reste ici. Avec quoi il s'est ouvert la gorge ?

translation.en: A piece of a mirror.
He probably broke the mirror into pieces...
translation.fr: Il a dû briser un miroir

translation.en: ...so he'd have something to cut himself with.
Seven years bad luck.
Esseker.
Are you okay, Ben?
I'm fine.
I'm sorry, excuse me.
I need to see his file.
-What? -I need his file.
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Je veux voir son dossier.

translation.en: What's the problem? I just need to see his file.
translation.fr:
- Ben.
- Quoi ? Je veux juste voir son dossier !

translation.en: Calm down. You're not even supposed to be down here.
translation.fr: Calme-toi. Tu ne devrais pas être ici

translation.en: Now you want to look at somebody's file?
translation.fr: et tu veux voir un dossier ?

translation.en: Look, I'll be off then. Amy, you know where to find me if you need me.
translation.fr: Je vous laisse. Amy, tu sais où me trouver.

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks, Peter. I appreciate it.
I want you to leave now. I'm serious, Ben. Amy, I'm sorry.
translation.fr:
- Je veux que tu partes. Sérieusement.
- Je suis désolé.

translation.en: I can't leave here until I see that file.
translation.fr: Je partirai pas sans avoir vu le dossier.

translation.en: It's important, please.
Please.
Amy. Come here and look at this picture.
Look at the piece of mirror that Gary Lewis is holding.
translation.fr: Le bout de miroir qu'il tient...

translation.en: And look at it up here in its reflected image in the other mirror.
translation.fr: Regarde son reflet dans l'autre miroir.

translation.en: It's full of blood.
Yet in reality, it's perfectly clean. Not a single drop on it.
translation.fr:
Dans la réalité, il est propre.
Pas une goutte de sang.

translation.en: It's probably the angle from which the photograph was taken.
translation.fr: Et alors ? C'est l'angle de prise de vue.

translation.en: What are you trying to prove?
What if the mirrors are showing us something that's not really happening?
translation.fr:
Si les miroirs reflétaient
des choses irréelles ?

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Just listen to me.
What if the mirrors are reflecting something that's beyond our reality?
translation.fr:
S'ils reflétaient quelque chose
qui est au-delà de notre réalité ?

translation.en: What if the mirrors can actually make us do things that we don't want to do?
translation.fr:
S'ils pouvaient nous forcer
à faire des choses ?

translation.en: Like making Gary Lewis slit his own throat.
Ben, listen to yourself. You can't talk like that around here.
translation.fr: Tu t'entends ? Tu ne peux pas dire ça ici.

translation.en: Don't you want to get reinstated?
Amy, I'm seeing things in the mirrors at work, bad things.
translation.fr:
Je vois des choses dans les miroirs,
à mon travail. Des choses terribles.

translation.en: To the point where I can feel what they're showing me.
Ben, you're driving me fucking crazy! I don't have time for this.
translation.fr: Tu me rends dingue ! J'ai pas le temps.

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
Do you think I'm making this up? Do you think I'm fucking lying?
translation.fr: Tu crois que j'invente ? Que je mens ?

translation.en: What medication are you taking to stop drinking?
translation.fr: Tu prends quoi, pour arrêter de boire ?

translation.en: That's a strong drug.
It has a lot of serious side effects. How many pills are you taking a day?
translation.fr:
Il y a des effets secondaires.
Combien par jour ?

translation.en: I'm sorry that I bothered you.
You're right.
Thanks for trying to help.
--at night at this bar, it's a couple blocks from here.
All right. Where's the body?
translation.fr:
- Où est le corps ?
- Du calme.

translation.en: -How am I gonna calm down? -Let the detective by. Step over here.
translation.fr:
- Comment me calmer ?
- Laissez passer l'inspecteur.

translation.en: And there's a guy been living with her at her place.
All right. You say she works at this bar? At night?
translation.fr: Bon. Elle travaille dans un bar ? Le soir ?

translation.en: Yeah, she works nights.
She comes home late. I don't see her come home.
translation.fr: Elle rentre tard. Je ne la vois pas rentrer.

translation.en: She probably closes the bar, right?
translation.fr: Elle ferme sans doute le bar.

translation.en: Yeah. Because she sleeps during the day, like early morning hours.
translation.fr: Oui. Car elle dort le jour, tôt le matin.

translation.en: All right. And....
I saw blood falling from the ceiling. Then she call me.
translation.fr: J'ai vu du sang couler du plafond...

translation.en: I want you to ask her, did she hear any noises? Any sounds?
translation.fr: Demandez-lui si elle a entendu des bruits.

translation.en: -What's going on? -We'll be with you in just a second.
translation.fr:
- Que se passe-t-il ?
- Une seconde. J'habite ici. J'étais dans la police.

translation.en: I live in Apartment 8. I used to be a cop. Just tell me what's going on.
translation.fr:
J'habite ici. J'étais dans la police. - Qu'y a-t-il ?
- Une seconde.

translation.en: -Just a second. -I want to talk to the lead detective!
translation.fr:
- Qu'y a-t-il ?
- Une seconde. Où est l'inspecteur ? Angela !

translation.en: Angela?
Who is the lead detective? Ben.
Larry, what the hell are you doing here?
-Larry, just tell me what's going on! -Ben, it's not good.
translation.fr:
- Dis-moi ce qu'il y a !
- Ben, c'est dur.

translation.en: Where's Angie?
Where the fuck is my sister? Tell them to let go of me!
translation.fr: Où est ma sœur ? Dis-leur de me lâcher !

translation.en: I can't do that, Ben! Goddamn it!
The water has obliterated most of the marks.
translation.fr: L'eau a effacé la plupart des traces.

translation.en: No sign of struggle or forced entry.
translation.fr: Pas de traces de lutte ni d'effraction.

translation.en: And the front door was locked, which means that...
translation.fr: La porte d'entrée était verrouillée. Donc...

translation.en: ...the person who did this either had keys to the apartment...
translation.fr: celui qui a fait ça avait les clés

translation.en: -...or it was someone that she knew. -He would've never laid a finger on her.
translation.fr: ou était un familier. Il n'aurait jamais levé la main sur elle.

translation.en: You know, when their father died, Ben took care of Angela.
translation.fr:
A la mort de leur père,
Ben s'est occupé d'Angela.

translation.en: She meant the world to him.
translation.fr: Elle était tout pour lui. Pour l'instant, sa déposition tient la route.

translation.en: Listen, so far, his statement is pretty consistent with the facts, you know?
translation.fr: Pour l'instant, sa déposition tient la route.

translation.en: We checked it out. He showed up to work at 7 p.m.
translation.fr:
On a vérifié.
Il est arrivé à son travail à 19 h.

translation.en: The downstairs neighbors said they began to notice the water leakage at around 10.
translation.fr: Et les voisins du dessous ont remarqué la fuite vers 22 h.

translation.en: The only strange thing, and this could just be a coincidence...
...is that Ben told the daytime security guard, Lorenzo Sapelli...
translation.fr:
Ben a dit au gardien de jour,
Lorenzo Sapelli,

translation.en: ...that he was planning on quitting the job.
Like he was moving away some place. He mention anything like that to you?
translation.fr: Comme s'il allait partir. Il t'en a parlé ?

translation.en: No.
Lately, communication hasn't been our strong point.
translation.fr: La communication n'est pas notre fort.

translation.en: What are you gonna do with him?
Let him go. We got no reason to keep him.
translation.fr: On n'a pas de raison de le garder.

translation.en: All right.
I'm so sorry.
Ben?
Why don't you come home and spend some days with the kids?
translation.fr:
Si tu venais passer
quelques jours avec les enfants ?

translation.en: I can't.
I don't want to put our children in danger.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas les mettre en danger.

translation.en: She asked me to quit, but I wouldn't.
translation.fr:
Elle m'avait dit de démissionner,
je l'ai pas fait.

translation.en: They came after her. What are you talking about?
translation.fr:
- Ils s'en sont pris à elle.
- De quoi tu parles ?

translation.en: I've got some things I need to take care of.
Wait, Ben. -Please. -Amy, let me go.
translation.fr:
- Attends. S'il te plaît.
- Laisse-moi y aller.

translation.en: I don't want you to get in any more trouble. Please, stay out of it.
translation.fr:
Ne t'attire plus d'ennuis. - Ne t'en mêle pas.
- Je sais qui a fait ça.

translation.en: I know who did this.
translation.fr:
- Ne t'en mêle pas.
- Je sais qui a fait ça.

translation.en: In that case, you've gotta tell Larry everything.
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, dis-le à Larry.

translation.en: He'll never believe me.
Neither will you.
What do you want?
Please, just tell me.
What do you want from me?
What do you want from me?
Esseker.
Hey. I need you to run a name for me. Esseker.
translation.fr:
Je voudrais
que tu cherches un nom : Esseker.

translation.en: Echo, Sierra, Sierra, Echo, Kilo, Echo, Romeo.
translation.fr:
Echo, Sierra, Sierra, Echo,
Kilo, Echo, Roméo.

translation.en: Did you check online? I've already done that.
translation.fr:
- Tu as essayé Internet ?
- C'est fait.

translation.en: Nothing. IRS and DMV.
translation.fr: Rien. Les Impôts et les Immatriculations.

translation.en: -Where? -Try New York.
-When? -Last five or six years.
translation.fr:
- Quand ?
- Remonte à cinq ou six ans.

translation.en: Okay, Ben.
Thanks. Get back to me as soon as you can.
"Mayflower burns, 48 presumed dead."
"Berry confesses deadly Mayflower fire."
"Watchman arrested."
"Woman, three children murdered." Come on, Ben, connect the dots.
translation.fr:
"Une femme et trois enfants assassinés."
Allez, Ben, fais le lien.

translation.en: "Mr. Berry maintains that the mirrors in the store are the ones...
translation.fr:
"M. Berry maintient que les miroirs "ont tué sa femme
et noyé leurs trois enfants."

translation.en: ...that brutally killed his wife and three children."
translation.fr:
"ont tué sa femme
et noyé leurs trois enfants."

translation.en: "Mirrors are guilty. Mirrors are guilty."
-Yeah. What did you get? -Hey.
Look, I didn't find anything under that name.
Shit! Shit.
Do you want me to look outside New York?
translation.fr: Tu veux que je cherche ailleurs ?

translation.en: No. Hold on. Hold on.
I want you to run another name for me. Berry, Terrence Berry.
translation.fr: Cherche un autre nom. Terrence Berry.

translation.en: Terrence Berry.
Wait one sec.
I think I got him. You still there?
translation.fr:
- Je crois que je l'ai. Tu es toujours là ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Your guy murdered his whole family. I already know that.
translation.fr:
- Il a assassiné sa famille.
- Je le sais déjà.

translation.en: He's dead.
Damn it.
Can you tell me where he was committed before he died?
translation.fr: Où était-il interné avant de mourir ?

translation.en: When one starts to perceive one's own reflection as a completely separate being...
translation.fr: Quand on perçoit son reflet comme un être totalement séparé,

translation.en: ...one is suddenly confronted with two entirely separate egos...
translation.fr:
on se trouve soudain confronté
à deux ego,

translation.en: ...two entirely separate worlds that can surface at any given moment.
translation.fr:
deux mondes différents,
qui peuvent surgir à tout moment.

translation.en: A feeling of self-hatred, usually triggered by a psychological shock...
translation.fr:
La haine de soi,
suite à un choc psychologique,

translation.en: ...can split the personality in two...
...hence creating two or more personalities with distinct memories...
...and distinct behavior patterns within the same individual.
translation.fr:
et des comportements différents,
au sein d'un même individu.

translation.en: The patient then has the false perception of the existence...
translation.fr: Le patient a alors l'illusion qu'il existe

translation.en: ...of two distinct worlds: the real world and the world inside a mirror.
translation.fr:
deux mondes distincts :
le monde réel et celui du miroir.

translation.en: These recordings were used in Terrence's trial.
translation.fr:
On a utilisé ces cassettes
au procès de Terrence.

translation.en: You'll see they speak for themselves.
Why did you set the department store on fire?
translation.fr: Pourquoi avoir incendié le magasin ? Pour détruire les miroirs.

translation.en: In order to destroy the mirrors.
Only fire can destroy mirrors, isn't that right, doctor?
translation.fr: Seul le feu détruit les miroirs, non ?

translation.en: What made you think you absolutely had to destroy those mirrors, Terrence?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi fallait-il
que vous détruisiez ces miroirs ?

translation.en: They killed my Helen... ...and my three children.
translation.fr:
Ils ont tué mon Helen...
et mes trois enfants.

translation.en: For what reason? Why would mirrors want to kill your family?
translation.fr: Pour quelle raison ? Pourquoi auraient-ils tué les vôtres ?

translation.en: -Because I didn't.... -Didn't do what?
translation.fr:
- Parce que je n'ai pas...
- Quoi ?

translation.en: They asked me to find Esseker.
translation.fr: Ils voulaient que je trouve Esseker.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
-We all are looking for Esseker. -Amy.
Excuse me, I have to go.
Tell me about Esseker, Terrence. Who is Esseker?
translation.fr:
Parlez-moi d'Esseker, Terrence.
Qui est Esseker ?

translation.en: I don't know who Esseker is!
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas qui est Esseker !

translation.en: I don't know who Esseker is!
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas qui est Esseker !

translation.en: I don't know!
Mrs. Carson? It's Rosa.
Mr. Ben is here. He's moving all of the furniture around.
translation.fr: M. Ben est là. Il déplace tous les meubles.

translation.en: Hey. How was school today?
Good. I'll be right back.
Dad?
Sweetheart, give me a second. I gotta take care of a couple things.
translation.fr: Une seconde, mon cœur. Je suis occupé.

translation.en: Daddy, what are you doing?
Honey, don't look scared. Everything's fine.
translation.fr: N'aie pas peur. Tout va bien.

translation.en: I think it looks nicer like this. Don't you?
translation.fr: C'est plus joli comme ça, non ?

translation.en: Rosa, what's happening?
Take the kids downstairs, right now. Right now!
translation.fr:
Emmenez les enfants en bas.
Tout de suite.

translation.en: What the hell are you doing?
You're gonna have to trust me, this is for your own protection.
translation.fr:
Fais-moi confiance.
C'est pour votre sécurité.

translation.en: Get out of the house, right now.
Are you listening to me?
translation.fr: Tu m'écoutes ? Tu fais peur aux enfants !

translation.en: You are scaring the kids. If you don't leave immediately...
translation.fr: Tu m'écoutes ? Tu fais peur aux enfants ! Pars, ou j'appelle la police

translation.en: ...I'm calling the police and you will never see your kids again.
translation.fr: et tu ne les verras plus !

translation.en: Amy, I am not crazy. These mirrors are dangerous.
translation.fr:
Je suis pas fou.
Ces miroirs sont dangereux.

translation.en: At first, I thought it was just the ones in the store, but after Angela was killed...
translation.fr:
Pas seulement au magasin.
Ils ont tué Angela.

translation.en: ...I realized they can get at you anywhere.
I promise I will leave the house, just let me cover these damn mirrors.
translation.fr: Je vais partir, mais laisse-moi les couvrir.

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
I know what you've been going through hasn't been easy.
translation.fr: Je sais que ça n'a pas été facile, pour toi. Mais pour nous non plus, figure-toi !

translation.en: But guess what. It hasn't been easy for us either.
translation.fr: Mais pour nous non plus, figure-toi !

translation.en: Angela was a part of our lives too, you know that?
translation.fr: Angela faisait aussi partie de notre vie.

translation.en: It's not fair what you're doing to us, Ben!
translation.fr: C'est pas juste, ce que tu nous fais subir !

translation.en: Michael.... He's acting so strange now.
translation.fr: Michael... Il a un comportement bizarre.

translation.en: He always wants to be alone, he won't talk to me, he's having nightmares.
translation.fr:
Il veut être seul. Il ne me parle pas.
Il fait des cauchemars.

translation.en: Ben, your behavior is rubbing off on him.
He is 6 years old, I have to protect him.
translation.fr: Il a six ans. Je dois le protéger !

translation.en: I want to show you something.
Ben, let go of me!
You don't want to believe me? Fine, I'll show you.
-What are you doing? -I'll show you!
Are you crazy?!
-Have you gone completely mad? -Just wait, you'll see.
translation.fr:
- Tu es complètement dingue !
- Tu vas voir.

translation.en: -See what? -You'll see.
See what, Ben? What am I supposed to see?
It's not happening.
It's not happening.
Amy, I swear to you, at the Mayflower....
I am not lying.
Ben, let's go back inside, okay?
Put the gun away.
Listen to me, baby. I want to help you.
Tell the kids I'm sorry.
translation.fr: Dis aux enfants que je regrette.

translation.en: Ben!
No!
Jesus Christ.
Larry, it's me. I need your help again.
translation.fr: Larry, j'ai encore besoin de toi.

translation.en: I'm trying to locate the patient-employee manifest for St. Matthew's Hospital.
translation.fr:
Je cherche la liste du personnel
et des patients de l'hôpital St Matthew.

translation.en: -Where is it? -Where was it? They closed it down.
translation.fr: C'est où ? C'était. Il a fermé.

translation.en: It was in New York, it's where the Mayflower used to be.
translation.fr: A New York, l'immeuble du Mayflower.

translation.en: The Mayflower? The department store?
Do you know where they'd store records for a hospital...
translation.fr: Tu sais où sont archivés les dossiers d'un hôpital fermé depuis 50 ans ?

translation.en: ...that's been closed for over 50 years?
I don't. But I can send someone to city hall to check it out.
translation.fr:
Je peux envoyer quelqu'un à la mairie. Un hôpital, ils doivent avoir des traces.
Il te faut quoi ?

translation.en: If it's a public hospital, there'd be a record of it. Tell me exactly what you need.
translation.fr:
Un hôpital, ils doivent avoir des traces.
Il te faut quoi ?

translation.en: Same thing. I'm looking for a patient or an employee with the name Esseker.
translation.fr:
Pareil. Je cherche un malade
ou un employé du nom d'Esseker. Je m'en occupe. Donne-moi deux heures.
Et, Ben... profil bas.

translation.en: All right, I'm on it. Give me a couple hours, and Ben, keep your head down.
translation.fr:
Je m'en occupe. Donne-moi deux heures.
Et, Ben... profil bas.

translation.en: Hey.
-Did you get it? -Yeah, I think so.
It's Anna Esseker.
I didn't really know what you wanted, so I got all the medical files.
translation.fr: Dans le doute, j'ai pris son dossier. C'est parfait.

translation.en: This is perfect, Larry. This is perfect.
What happened? Did you get in an accident?
Anna Esseker's file, did you have to go to city hall?
translation.fr: Son dossier, tu l'as eu à la mairie ?

translation.en: I didn't have to go anywhere. All the files in that place...
translation.fr:
Non. Leurs archives sont chez nous,
aux affaires classées.

translation.en: ...were in storage with the cold-case evidence.
translation.fr:
Leurs archives sont chez nous,
aux affaires classées.

translation.en: -Why, because of the fire? -No, no, it's before the fire.
translation.fr:
A cause de l'incendie ? Non, ça date d'avant l'incendie.
Une tout autre affaire.

translation.en: It's a totally different case.
translation.fr:
Non, ça date d'avant l'incendie.
Une tout autre affaire.

translation.en: Anna was a patient at St. Matthew's.
translation.fr: Anna était soignée à St Matthew.

translation.en: She was in the psych ward run by a Dr. Kane.
translation.fr:
En psychiatrie,
dans le service d'un certain Dr Kane.

translation.en: Now get this, she was only 12 years old when she died.
translation.fr: Elle avait 12 ans quand elle est morte.

translation.en: What?
When the nurses went on their rounds first thing in the morning October 6th, 1952...
translation.fr:
Les infirmières, en faisant leur ronde,
le matin du 6 octobre 1952,

translation.en: ...they discovered that all the patients had left their rooms during the night.
translation.fr:
n'ont pas trouvé
les malades dans leurs chambres

translation.en: They'd all gathered in the main hall. Ben, they were all dead, including the girl.
translation.fr: mais réunis dans le grand hall. Ils étaient tous morts. La fille aussi.

translation.en: Apparently, they killed each other. I mean, it was a slaughterhouse.
translation.fr: Ils se seraient entretués. Une boucherie.

translation.en: That's when they closed the place down. Who knows what really happened?
translation.fr:
L'hôpital a été fermé.
On sait pas ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: What about the doctor? Kane?
translation.fr:
- Et le médecin ? Kane ?
- Il a été arrêté.

translation.en: They arrested him. They found him dead first day of the hearing.
translation.fr: Mais le jour de son audition,

translation.en: He slashed his wrists with a piece of the cell mirror.
translation.fr:
il s'est ouvert les veines
avec le miroir de sa cellule.

translation.en: Thanks for your help. Good luck.
translation.fr:
- Merci de ton aide.
- Bonne chance.

translation.en: Damn it!
Jesus.
"October 6th, 1952."
"Anna Esseker is diagnosed with severe schizophrenia, leading...
...to withdrawal from reality, delusional and violent behavior."
"Pennsylvania, August 1951."
They don't match.
Anna Esseker was discharged from St. Matthew's Hospital October 4th.
translation.fr:
Anna Esseker est sortie de St Matthew
le 4 octobre.

translation.en: Two days before the massacre.
She's still alive, isn't she?
translation.fr: Elle est toujours vivante, c'est ça ?

translation.en: You almost done, sweetie?
Okay. Why is Daddy acting so scared? It's not normal.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi il a l'air d'avoir peur ?
C'est pas normal.

translation.en: He's way older than me.
translation.fr: Il est beaucoup plus grand que moi,

translation.en: And I'm not acting scared, but he is.
translation.fr: et moi j'ai pas peur, mais lui oui.

translation.en: Doesn't make any sense. Michael? What are you doing?
translation.fr:
- Je comprends pas pourquoi.
- Qu'est-ce que tu fais ?

translation.en: Nothing.
Okay, well, we gotta get going, all right? Okay.
translation.fr:
- Il faut qu'on y aille.
- D'accord.

translation.en: Amy? Amy, what's wrong?
You have to come to the house right now.
translation.fr: Viens tout de suite à la maison.

translation.en: I'm so scared.
Amy, what's wrong? I'm so scared.
-Amy, just tell me what happened. -There's something in the house.
translation.fr:
- Dis-moi ce qui s'est passé.
- Il y a quelque chose dans la maison.

translation.en: Something in the mirrors.
I'm on my way. Goddamn it!
Come on.
Dad? When are you coming back home? Really soon, sweetheart. Come here.
translation.fr:
- Papa ? Tu reviens quand ?
- Bientôt, mon cœur.

translation.en: I love you, Daddy. I love you, too, sweetheart.
translation.fr:
- Je t'aime, papa.
- Moi aussi, je t'aime.

translation.en: I gotta go.
I'm afraid to stay here.
There's gonna be windows and mirrors wherever you go.
translation.fr: Il y a des fenêtres et des miroirs partout.

translation.en: Anything that causes a reflection right now is dangerous.
At least inside the house we covered everything. It's the safest place to be.
translation.fr: Ici, au moins, on a tout couvert. C'est l'endroit le plus sûr.

translation.en: Amy, I'm so sorry.
No. It's not your fault. I should've believed you.
translation.fr: C'est pas de ta faute. J'aurais dû te croire.

translation.en: Come here.
Ben, you do whatever it takes to end this.
translation.fr: Fais tout pour que ça cesse.

translation.en: You hear me? I will.
I'll be right back.
Jesus.
Yes, sir.
Excuse me. Is this the Esseker farm?
translation.fr: Pardon. C'est bien la ferme des Esseker ?

translation.en: What is it, Jimmy?
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi, Jimmy ?
- Je sais pas, m'man.

translation.en: I don't know, Ma. What can I do for you, sir?
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi, Jimmy ?
- Je sais pas, m'man. - C'est pour quoi ?
- Je cherche Anna Esseker.

translation.en: I'm looking for Anna, Anna Esseker.
translation.fr:
- C'est pour quoi ?
- Je cherche Anna Esseker.

translation.en: There's a man looking for.... You said "Anna"?
translation.fr: C'est un homme qui cherche... Anna ?

translation.en: Yes, Anna Esseker.
An Anna Esseker, Ma.
Look, I'm sorry to bother you, I must have the wrong place.
translation.fr:
Pardon de vous avoir dérangé.
J'ai dû me tromper.

translation.en: What is it you want with Anna Esseker?
translation.fr: Vous lui voulez quoi, à Anna Esseker ?

translation.en: I'm doing a research paper on schizophrenia.
translation.fr: J'écris un article sur la schizophrénie.

translation.en: I became familiar with Anna Esseker's case.
translation.fr: Je me suis intéressé à son cas.

translation.en: I just wanted to ask her some questions.
translation.fr: Je voulais lui poser quelques questions.

translation.en: Go tell Grandpa there's a man here who's asking about his sister.
translation.fr:
Va dire au grand-père
qu'un homme demande après sa sœur.

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you.
Grandpa?
You know...
...up to this day, visions of Anna's fits still haunt me at night.
translation.fr:
Vous savez, aujourd'hui encore, des visions des crises d'Anna
hantent mes nuits.

translation.en: I helped my father fix up this part of the basement especially for her.
translation.fr:
J'ai aidé mon père à aménager cette cave
spécialement pour elle.

translation.en: Her fits were too violent.
My mother couldn't take her screams anymore.
translation.fr: Ma mère ne supportait plus ses cris.

translation.en: We had every priest, doctor, healer, coming in from all over the county.
translation.fr:
On a fait venir des prêtres, docteurs,
guérisseurs, des quatre coins du comté.

translation.en: But no one could help her.
translation.fr: Personne ne pouvait rien pour elle.

translation.en: Finally, a Dr. Kane from New York... ...answered my parents' cries for help.
translation.fr:
Un Dr Kane, de New York, a répondu
aux appels à l'aide de mes parents.

translation.en: He rejected the idea of demonic possession... ...said he didn't believe in it.
translation.fr:
Il excluait un phénomène de possession.
Il n'y croyait pas.

translation.en: He was convinced Anna suffered from a rare form of personality disorder...
translation.fr:
Il pensait qu'Anna souffrait d'une forme
rare de trouble de la personnalité

translation.en: ...and mirrors could help her.
translation.fr: et que les miroirs pouvaient l'aider.

translation.en: He wanted Anna under his care, at St. Matthew's.
translation.fr:
Il voulait la prendre dans son service,
à St Matthew.

translation.en: My parents were very poor, but he agreed to cover all the costs of the hospital.
translation.fr: Mes parents étaient pauvres. Il prenait tous les frais à sa charge.

translation.en: Where did she go after the hospital?
Don't you know?
She died there with all of Kane's other patients.
translation.fr: Elle est morte là-bas, avec les autres.

translation.en: Mr. Esseker, I read the file.
Anna left the hospital two days before the massacre.
translation.fr:
Anna est sortie deux jours
avant le massacre.

translation.en: Dr. Kane altered the documents so she could disappear.
translation.fr:
Kane a falsifié les papiers
pour qu'elle puisse disparaître.

translation.en: Where did you get that document?
I need you to tell me where she went after St. Matthew's.
translation.fr: Dites-moi où elle est allée après.

translation.en: She came back and stayed with us for a while.
translation.fr: Elle est revenue ici quelque temps.

translation.en: What do you mean for a while? What happened? Why did she leave?
translation.fr:
Comment ça "quelque temps" ?
Pourquoi est-elle partie ?

translation.en: I don't want to talk about that. Why did she leave?
translation.fr:
- Je veux pas en parler.
- Pourquoi est-elle partie ?

translation.en: Because strange things started to happen in the house.
translation.fr:
Des choses étranges
ont commencé à se produire.

translation.en: With Anna?
No, not with Anna anymore. No, she was totally cured.
translation.fr: Non. Plus avec Anna. Elle était guérie.

translation.en: Strange things started to happen with the mirrors, didn't they?
translation.fr:
Des choses étranges
avec les miroirs, c'est ça ?

translation.en: Mr. Esseker, I need to know where Anna is now, it's a matter of life and death.
translation.fr:
Il faut que je sache où est Anna.
Question de vie ou de mort.

translation.en: Do not make me threaten you.
translation.fr: Ne m'obligez pas à vous menacer.

translation.en: We sent her somewhere where mirrors are forbidden.
translation.fr:
On l'a envoyée dans un endroit
où les miroirs sont interdits.

translation.en: Where the mirrors couldn't find her. Where? Where?!
translation.fr:
- Où ils ne pourraient pas la trouver.
- Où ça ?

translation.en: St. Augustine's Monastery, on the road to Reedfield.
translation.fr:
Au couvent de St Augustine,
sur la route de Reedfield.

translation.en: How can I help you?
I'm sorry to disturb you, Sister...
...but I've come to speak with a member of your community. Anna Esseker.
translation.fr:
je voudrais parler à l'une
de vos religieuses, Anna Esseker.

translation.en: Is she expecting you?
No, not really.
If you're not listed, I cannot help you, sir.
translation.fr:
Si vous n'êtes pas sur la liste,
je ne peux rien faire.

translation.en: Can you at least tell her that I've come from New York...
translation.fr:
Dites-lui au moins
que je viens de New York

translation.en: ...to speak with her?
I work with Dr. Kane from St. Matthew's Hospital.
translation.fr:
Je travaille avec le Dr Kane,
de l'hôpital St Matthew.

translation.en: It's very important, please.
St. Matthew's closed down in 1952. Who are you?
translation.fr:
St Matthew a fermé en 1952.
Qui êtes-vous ?

translation.en: My name is Benjamin Carson.
I work as a night watchman on 6th Avenue in New York City.
translation.fr:
Je suis gardien de nuit
sur la 6e Avenue, à New York.

translation.en: In the building that used to be St. Matthew's Hospital.
What is it you want, Mr. Carson?
My family is in danger.
And what's threatening them is asking for you.
translation.fr: Et ce qui les menace vous réclame.

translation.en: I came all this way to ask you...
translation.fr:
J'ai fait toute cette route
pour venir vous demander

translation.en: ...why the mirrors that were left over from St. Matthew's Hospital...
translation.fr:
J'ai fait toute cette route
pour venir vous demander pourquoi les miroirs de St Matthew

translation.en: ...are so desperate to find you.
Please, Miss Esseker.
If you don't help me, I'm gonna lose the most important thing to me in this world...
translation.fr: Si vous ne m'aidez pas, je vais perdre ce qui m'est le plus cher,

translation.en: ...and that's my family.
Sit down, Mr. Carson.
The mirrors are merely windows on our world.
translation.fr:
Les miroirs
ne sont que des fenêtres sur notre monde.

translation.en: It is not the wish of the mirrors to find me...
translation.fr: Ce ne sont pas eux qui me réclament,

translation.en: ...but of what is imprisoned inside them.
translation.fr: mais ce qui est emprisonné en eux.

translation.en: What is imprisoned inside them?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui est emprisonné en eux ?

translation.en: At the time... ...that I was at St. Matthew's...
translation.fr: A l'époque où j'étais à St Matthew,

translation.en: ...Dr. Kane's therapy for personality disorders...
translation.fr:
la thérapie du Dr Kane
pour les troubles de la personnalité

translation.en: ...consisted of locking the patient up in a mirrored room...
translation.fr:
consistait à enfermer plusieurs jours
le patient dans une pièce

translation.en: ...for several days on end... ...forcing them to confront their own image.
translation.fr:
couverte de miroirs pour le forcer
à affronter sa propre image.

translation.en: Dr. Kane was wrong about his theory.
translation.fr: Le Dr Kane se trompait dans sa théorie.

translation.en: There is no cure for schizophrenia, Mr. Carson.
translation.fr: On ne guérit pas de la schizophrénie.

translation.en: It was something else.
And whatever it was, it left me... ...and entered the mirrors.
translation.fr:
Quelque chose qui est sorti de moi
et qui est entré dans les miroirs.

translation.en: Since that day...
...it has been collecting the souls of the people it kills.
translation.fr: s'empare des âmes de ceux qu'il tue.

translation.en: I'm sorry...
...but if I agree to go with you and return back to that place...
translation.fr:
mais si j'accepte de vous suivre
et si j'y retourne,

translation.en: ...I will make it possible for the demon to cross the threshold...
translation.fr: je permettrai au démon de revenir dans le monde réel.

translation.en: ...back into the real world.
translation.fr: de revenir dans le monde réel.

translation.en: Do you understand what that means for my family?
translation.fr:
Vous savez
ce que ça signifie pour les miens ?

translation.en: You can't do this, you need to come back with me.
translation.fr: Il faut que vous veniez avec moi.

translation.en: I'm going to pray for you and your family.
translation.fr: Je vais prier pour vous et pour les vôtres.

translation.en: That's all I can do right now, Mr. Carson. I'm sorry.
translation.fr:
C'est tout ce que je peux faire.
Je suis désolée.

translation.en: God bless you.
Gary Lewis, Terrence Berry, and many other men... ...have died trying to find you.
translation.fr:
Gary Lewis, Terrence Berry et d'autres
sont morts en essayant de vous retrouver.

translation.en: And because they failed, their families died, too.
translation.fr: Et des membres de leurs familles aussi.

translation.en: Two days ago, my sister was murdered.
translation.fr:
Il y a deux jours,
ma sœur a été assassinée.

translation.en: My family will be next if you don't help me.
translation.fr:
Les miens seront les prochains
si vous ne m'aidez pas.

translation.en: Please.
Please. Wait, wait.
This is my family.
This is my wife Amy...
...and my daughter Daisy, and my son Michael.
translation.fr: ma fille Daisy et mon fils Michael.

translation.en: They're beautiful.
They're innocent, they've never hurt anybody.
translation.fr:
Ils sont innocents.
Ils n'ont fait de mal à personne.

translation.en: Please.
Take the photo.
Just take the photo.
Look at them.
I'm sorry.
Who the hell do you think you are?
They're just kids!
-Hello? -Amy.
Ben, where are you? At the monastery.
-Did you find her? -Yes.
Did you talk to....
-Amy? -Michael?
Michael?
-Ben, hold on, Michael's gone. -What do you mean?
translation.fr:
Michael n'est plus là. - Comment ça ?
- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: I don't know, I fell asleep with the kids on the bed and now I don't know where he is.
translation.fr:
Je me suis endormie avec eux,
et il n'est plus là. Michael ?

translation.en: Amy, what's going on? Is everything all right?
Oh, fuck.
Amy, what's going on? Have you got Michael?
Oh, my God.
Ben... ...there's water everywhere.
translation.fr: Il y a de l'eau partout.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
You've gotta be careful of the water. It creates reflections.
translation.fr: Attention à l'eau. Ça crée des reflets.

translation.en: Someone is in the house.
translation.fr: Il y a quelqu'un dans la maison.

translation.en: Someone scraped all the mirrors!
Amy, where is Michael?
I don't know. I don't see him anywhere.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Je ne le trouve pas.

translation.en: You've gotta stay away from the water.
Get the kids and stay away from the water!
-Michael? -Amy?
Amy?! Shit!
Which room is she in? Which one?
translation.fr: Elle est dans quelle chambre ? Laquelle ?

translation.en: My family is not dying tonight. You are coming with me.
translation.fr:
Ils ne mourront pas ce soir.
Venez avec moi.

translation.en: Michael?
Daisy?
Daisy, come here.
Come here, Daisy.
Mom?
Come here, sweetheart.
What are you doing in there?
Everything's gonna be all right.
No!
No!
Daisy!
Come here! Get down! Get down, right now!
Get down, sweetie. Get down. Oh, my God, are you okay?
Oh, my God! Stay right there, don't move, baby. Don't move.
translation.fr: Mon Dieu ! Reste là. Ne bouge pas !

translation.en: Mom, why did you do that to me?
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi t'as fait ça ?
- C'est pas moi.

translation.en: It wasn't me, sweetheart. You know I would never hurt you.
translation.fr: Tu sais que je ne te ferais pas de mal.

translation.en: Here. Hold this. Hold it tight.
Okay?
Here, get down, sweetie. Let me see. Let me see.
Let me see, sweetie. It's gonna be okay.
All right? I know it hurts, stay right there.
translation.fr: Je sais que ça fait mal. Reste là.

translation.en: Give me your hand. I need you to hold it really tight, okay?
Just flat and tight, just like that. Okay.
Now, I need you to listen to me, okay, baby?
Okay.
translation.fr:
Ecoute-moi. - Tu vas être très courageuse.
- D'accord.

translation.en: You have to be very brave. I need you to stay here no matter what happens.
translation.fr:
- Tu vas être très courageuse.
- D'accord. Tu vas rester ici, quoi qu'il arrive.

translation.en: No matter what you hear. Do not move from this closet until I come back.
translation.fr:
Quoi que tu entendes,
ne sors pas de ce placard.

translation.en: -You understand me, right? Okay. -Yes.
Okay.
Do not move. I love you.
Don't move.
Michael?
Michael?
Where are you?
Michael?
Michael!
Michael, what are you doing?
Don't be scared, Mommy. He just wants to play with us.
translation.fr:
N'aie pas peur.
Il veut seulement jouer avec nous.

translation.en: Michael, I want you to drop that knife, right now.
translation.fr: Lâche tout de suite ce couteau.

translation.en: Do you hear me?
You know very well you're not allowed to play with knives. Don't you?
translation.fr:
Tu sais que tu n'as pas le droit
de jouer avec les couteaux.

translation.en: Come on.
That's a good boy.
Give me the knife, Michael.
Michael! Michael!
Michael?
Michael?
Michael?
Michael? Mike--?
Michael.
Michael?
Why are you hiding from me, sweetheart?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu te caches, mon chéri ?

translation.en: Michael?
You okay? Come on.
It's waiting for me downstairs.
translation.fr: C'est en bas que je suis attendue.

translation.en: Bring me inside. From now on, I have to keep my eyes closed.
translation.fr:
Faites-moi entrer. A partir de là,
je dois garder les yeux fermés.

translation.en: Step up. You're in the room.
translation.fr: Entrez. Vous êtes dans la salle.

translation.en: Strap me in.
I spent the darkest days of my life in this room.
translation.fr:
J'ai vécu ici
les jours les plus sombres de ma vie.

translation.en: Are you sure there's no other way?
This is for your family, Mr. Carson.
translation.fr: C'est pour votre famille, M. Carson.

translation.en: For your family.
Michael?
Michael? Michael, look at me.
Michael! No, Michael!
Give him back to me!
No!
No! Get out!
No, Michael!
No!
Please. Please.
You must go now.
Thank you.
No!
Why?
Give him back!
Give him back! Give him back!
Michael!
No!
Michael? Oh, my baby!
Come on.
One, two, three....
Five, six....
Thank God!
Michael, I love you. I love you!
Anna!
Get away, you bitch!
Oh, my baby.
I love you.
translation.fr: Je vous aime tous les deux.

translation.en: I love you, guys.
